GSD.description:
fortify: Fix __compiletime_strlen() under UBSAN_BOUNDS_LOCAL

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 5d59ad2bfb35fccfe2ad5e8bb8801f6224d3f7d4. For more details please see the references link.
